definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is the largest water conservancy project in Yangtze Vally.
sentences.chinese: 三峽大壩是長江流域最大的水利工程。

sentences.english: Developing the idle land in winter in Yangtze River basin for expanding the acreage of rape.
sentences.chinese: 大力開發長江流域冬閒田土，擴大油菜種植面積。

sentences.english: The Six Dynasties, river water, Tianya million mu.
sentences.chinese: 六朝舊事，一江流水，萬感天涯暮。

sentences.english: The great lakes along The Yangtze are also victims of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 長江流域五大湖也遭受旱災的影響。

sentences.english: There is higher mercury in the soil near Wu Jiang River.
sentences.chinese: 烏江流域土壤含汞值高，在烏江干流將進行九級開發。

sentences.english: Ever since Song Dynasty, the Yangtze River basins has been the center of silk industry of China.
sentences.chinese: 自宋代以來，長江流域一直是我國絲綢業的重心。

sentences.english: In this paper the hydrologic forecasting of a certain river in the Pearl River Basin has been taken as an example.
sentences.chinese: 並以珠江流域某河流的長期水文預測報爲實例。

sentences.english: This thesis hopes to offer the reference for hydropower cascade development and navigation planning in the Jinsha river.
sentences.chinese: 爲金沙江流域的水電梯級開發和航運規劃提供參考。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam project threatens many endangered species that are native to the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 三峽工程危及到了長江流域很多物種。

sentences.english: When the water arrives from the Yangzi basin, officials in Beijing and Hebei will breathe a little easier.
sentences.chinese: 當水從長江流域到來，北京和河北當局將鬆一口氣。

sentences.english: A survey on the aquatic vascular plants of the Pearl River basin in Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 廣東境內珠江流域水生維管束植物區系的探討。

sentences.english: River Flows Ramification-around Austin, Zhao spent on the lam all likelihood sleet.
sentences.chinese: 江流宛轉繞芳甸，月照花林皆似霰。

sentences.english: During the Spring and Autumn period, in the Yangtze valley the confrontation appeared between Yue and Chu.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時期，長江流域山現越楚對峙的局面。

sentences.english: They traveled down the river ona wooden raft.
sentences.chinese: 他們乘坐木筏順江流而下。

sentences.english: It is very important to construct Pearl River drainage area economic belt.
sentences.chinese: 珠江流域經濟帶的建設意義重大。

sentences.english: With the afterglow mountains Qian Shen, Jiang Liu Shusei day and night change.
sentences.chinese: 山色淺深隨夕照，江流日夜變秋聲。

definition: kun 鯤|鲲[kun1] and peng 鵬|鹏[Peng2], mythological beasts/peng, a gigantic bird transformed from the kun
palace of the Dragon King at the bottom of the Eastern Sea
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
(literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
